item.title: OutKast - Ms.jackson
item.description:
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion times
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion times
My baby’s drama mama
don’t like me
She be doing things
like having them boys
Come from
her neighborhood
To the studio
trying to fight me
She needs to get
a piece of
The American pie
and take her bite out
That’s my house
I’ll disconnect
The cable and
turn the lights out
And let her know
her grand child
Is a baby
and not a paycheck
Private school
daycare
Shit medical bills
I pay that
I love your mam and
everything but see
I ain’t the only one
who lay down
She wanna rib you up
to start a custody war
My lawyers stay down
she never got a chance
To hear my side
of the story
We was divided
she had fish fries
And cookouts for
my child’s birthday
I ain’t invited
despite it
I show her
the utmost respect
When I fall through
all you do
Is defend that lady
when I call you
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion time
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion time
Me and your daughter
got a special thang
Going on you say
it’s puppy love
We say it’s
full- grown
Hope that we feel
this feel this way
Forever you can plan
a pretty picnic
But you can’t
predict the weather
Ms.Jackson
ten times out of nine
If I’m lying find
the quickest muzzle
Throw it
on my mouth
And I’ll decline
King meets Queen
Then the puppy
love thing together
Dream ‘bout that crib
with the goodyear
Swing on the oak tree
I hope we feel
Like this forever
forever forever ever
Forever ever
forever
Never seems that long
until you’re grown
And notice that
the day by day
Ruler can’t be
too wrong Ms.Jackson
My intentions
were good
I wish I could
become a magician
To abracadabra
all the sadder
Thoughts of me
thoughts of she
Thoughts of he
asking what happened
To the feeling
that her and me had
I pray so much about
it need some knee pads
It happened
for a reason
One can’t be mad
so know this know
That everything’s cool
and yes
I will be present
on the first day
Of school
and graduation
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion times
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion times
Look at the way
he treats me shit
Look at the way
you treat me
You see your little
nosy ass home
Girl done got
your ass sent up
The creak G
without a paddle
You left to straddle
and ride this thing
On out now
you and your girl
Ain’t speaking
no more
Cause my dick
all in her mouth
You know what I’m
talking about jealousy
Infidelity envy
cheating beating
And D to the G
they be the same thing
But who you placing
the blame on
You keep on singing
that same song
Let bygones be bygones
and you can go
And get the hell
on you and ya mama
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion time
I’m sorry Ms.Jackson
woo I am for real
Never meant to make
your daughter cry
I apologize
a trillion time

woo I am for real

a trillion time

to see me

the feeling
‘Cause the thought
alone is
